org.apache.fineract.commands.provider

Class CommandHandlerProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fineract.commands.provider.CommandHandlerProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @Component
 @Scope(value="singleton")
public class CommandHandlerProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    CommandHandlerProvider provides NewCommandSourceHandlers for a given entity and action.

    A NewCommandSourceHandler can be registered and the annotation CommandType is used to determine the entity and the action the handler is capable to process.
    Since:
    15.06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Markus Geiss
    See Also:
    NewCommandSourceHandler, CommandType

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NewCommandSourceHandler getHandler(java.lang.String entity, java.lang.String action)
      Returns a handler for the given entity and action.

      Throws an UnsupportedCommandException if no handler for the given entity, action combination can be found.
      void setApplicationContext(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext applicationContext)

    • Method Detail

      • getHandler

        @Nonnull
public NewCommandSourceHandler getHandler(@Nonnull
                                                   java.lang.String entity,
                                                   @Nonnull
                                                   java.lang.String action)
        Returns a handler for the given entity and action.

        Throws an UnsupportedCommandException if no handler for the given entity, action combination can be found.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to lookup the handler, must be given.
        action - the action to lookup the handler, must be given.
